title: Support for video, pictures and sound
desc: Add support for video, pictures and sound fact to the import and visualization plugins.

title: Encryption of data for Electron
desc: Add encryption support for the database to the Electron version. There should be a configuration option, so that the use can decide whats gets encrypted

title: Undo
desc: Add a simple undo function for the workspace - it should work indenpent of the protocol

title: Formal Concept Analysis Visualization
desc: Graph visualization of rules and implications.

title: Hexagon heatmap
desc: Add a hexagon heatmap to the map plugin.

title: Summary and improved statistics of data
desc: Add a summary and improved statistics of data to expdb and use it in the right places, e.g. data-atlas.

title: Embed wikipedia for searching
desc: Wikipedia embedding for faster and better additional data.

title: Hints and suggestions for next steps
desc: To empower the user, the system should give hints and suggestions for next steps.

title: Notifications
desc: More transparent error messages and notifications for the user.

title: Migration
desc: Implement a migration strategy for the user data and events.

title: Sharing
desc: Adds a sharing function that allows users to share their data and projects without a shared server.

title: Performance
desc: Improve the performance, mainly import and read performance for the data.

title: Units
desc: Allow the user to specify units for facts and allow operations based on the units, e.g. tranforming units into different ones.

title: Better Charts
desc: Check out ECharts and test them compared to Chartjs.

title: Better Map
desc: Look into performance improvements for the map plugin. The goal is to have a similar performance as mosaic.

title: Improve Table
desc: Add some common features to the table plugin.

title: Aggregations
desc: Improve the indicator plugin to allow more complex aggregations, e.g. by introducing a VPL.

title: Time granularities
desc: Allow more flexibility for time attributes.
